text: Sleeper is a 1973 American science fiction comedy movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and starring Diane Keaton, John Beck, Bartlett Robinson, Jackie Mason. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 science fiction movies Category:1973 comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:Dystopian movies Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in the 22nd century Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Screenplays by Woody Allen
title: Sleeper (1973 movie)
